decision_reasoning: improper application of residency requirement test
application_details: blended 'strict calculation of time' and 'substantial connection' tests without fully analyzing the Applicant's connection to other countries
cause_of_action: denial of citizenship application based on alleged failure to meet residency requirements
procedure_followed: appeal from the Citizenship Judge's decision, reviewed by Justice Heneghan
result_of_case: appeal was successful, Citizenship Judge's decision was overturned
